sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../App.css'; const MainDashboard = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [selectedPort, setSelectedPort] = useState('All Ports'); const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); const navigate = useNavigate(); // Mock data for hero carousel const heroSlides = [ { id: 1, title: "Revolutionizing Global Trade", subtitle: "Connecting businesses across continents with trusted partnerships", image: "/placeholder-hero.jpg", cta: "Explore Opportunities" }, { id: 2, title: "Verified Suppliers Worldwide", subtitle: "Work with pre-verified partners for secure transactions", image: "/placeholder-hero2.jpg", cta: "Find Suppliers" }, { id: 3, title: "End-to-End Trade Solutions", subtitle: "From RFQ to delivery, we've got you covered", image: "/placeholder-hero3.jpg", cta: "Learn More" } ]; // Mock data for featured categories const categories = [ { id: 1, name: "Electronics", icon: "üîå", count: "12,450+" }, { id: 2, name: "Machinery", icon: "‚öôÔ∏è", count: "8,760+" }, { id: 3, name: "Textiles", icon: "üßµ", count: "15,230+" }, { id: 4, name: "Chemicals", icon: "‚öóÔ∏è", count: "6,890+" }, { id: 5, name: "Food & Beverages", icon: "üçé", count: "9,420+" }, { id: 6, name: "Automotive", icon: "üöó", count: "7,560+" }, { id: 7, name: "Construction", icon: "üèóÔ∏è", count: "5,320+" }, { id: 8, name: "Healthcare", icon: "‚öïÔ∏è", count: "4,890+" } ]; // Mock data for catalogs const catalogs = [ { id: 1, title: 'Premium Electronics Components', seller: 'VEND-23-ABC123', port: 'Mumbai Port', category: 'Electronics', description: 'High-quality electronic components for industrial use with 5-year warranty', price: '$5,000', likes: 1240, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.8, verified: true }, { id: 2, title: 'Organic Cotton Textiles', seller: 'VEND-23-XYZ789', port: 'Chennai Port', category: 'Textiles', description: 'Sustainable organic cotton fabrics for fashion industry, GOTS certified', price: '$3,500', likes: 890, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.9, verified: true }, { id: 3, title: 'Industrial Machinery Parts', seller: 'VEND-23-DEF456', port: 'JNPT', category: 'Machinery', description: 'Heavy-duty machinery components for manufacturing with ISO 9001 certification', price: '$12,000', likes: 670, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.7, verified: false }, { id: 4, title: 'Specialty Chemicals', seller: 'VEND-23-GHI321', port: 'Vishakhapatnam Port', category: 'Chemicals', description: 'High-purity chemicals for pharmaceutical industry, REACH compliant', price: '$8,500', likes: 420, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.6, verified: true }, { id: 5, title: 'Automotive Spare Parts', seller: 'VEND-23-JKL987', port: 'Kolkata Port', category: 'Automotive', description: 'OEM quality automotive components with 2-year guarantee', price: '$6,200', likes: 750, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.5, verified: true }, { id: 6, title: 'Construction Materials', seller: 'VEND-23-MNO654', port: 'Mumbai Port', category: 'Construction', description: 'High-grade construction materials with ISI certification', price: '$4,800', likes: 530, image: '/placeholder.jpg', rating: 4.4, verified: false } ]; const ports = ['All Ports', 'Mumbai Port', 'Chennai Port', 'JNPT', 'Kolkata Port', 'Vishakhapatnam Port']; // Auto-rotate hero carousel useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setCurrentSlide((prev) => (prev === heroSlides.length - 1 ? 0 : prev + 1)); }, 5000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, [heroSlides.length]); const handleRFQ = (catalogId) => { // In a real app, this would check if user is logged in // For now, we'll redirect to login navigate('/login'); }; return (
{/* Header */}

navigate('/')}>MarsaFyi

  • {e.preventDefault(); navigate('/');}} className="nav-link active">Home
  • {e.preventDefault(); navigate('/shop');}} className="nav-link">Shop
  • {e.preventDefault(); navigate('/about');}} className="nav-link">About
  • {e.preventDefault(); navigate('/contact');}} className="nav-link">Contact
{/* Hero Section with Carousel */}

))}

{catalog.verified && ( ‚úì Verified )}

{'‚òÖ'.repeat(Math.floor(catalog.rating))} {catalog.rating}

))}
{/* About Company Section */}

About MarsaFyi

MarsaFyi is a revolutionary global B2B trade platform that connects buyers and sellers across continents. Our mission is to simplify international trade by providing a secure, transparent, and efficient marketplace for businesses of all sizes.

Founded in 2023, we've grown to become a trusted partner for over 50,000 businesses worldwide. Our platform leverages cutting-edge technology to ensure secure transactions, verified suppliers, and seamless logistics coordination.

50K+

Business Partners

150+

Countries Served

99.9%

Transaction Security

Global Trade Visualization
{/* How It Works Section */}

How MarsaFyi Works

1

Register & Verify

Sign up and verify your business credentials to join our trusted network

2

Explore & Connect

Browse catalogs from verified suppliers or post your requirements

3

Transact Securely

Use our secure payment system and trade assurance for protection

4

Ship & Deliver

Coordinate logistics through our integrated shipping partners

{/* Testimonials Section */}

What Our Clients Say

"MarsaFyi has transformed our sourcing process. We've found reliable suppliers in 20+ countries!"

Sarah Johnson

Procurement Director, TechGlobal Inc.

"The verification process gives us confidence in every transaction. Highly recommended!"

Michael Chen

CEO, Manufacturing Solutions Ltd.

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Transform Your Global Trade?

Join thousands of businesses already using MarsaFyi to expand their global reach

{/* Footer */}

MarsaFyi

Global B2B Trade Platform connecting buyers and sellers worldwide

üìò üê¶ üì∑ üíº

For Buyers

  • Submit RFQ
  • Search Suppliers
  • Trade Assurance
  • Payment Options

For Suppliers

  • Display Products
  • Supplier Membership
  • Learning Center
  • Success Stories

Company

  • About Us
  • Contact Us
  • Careers
  • Press

© 2025 MarsaFyi. All rights reserved. | Privacy Policy | Terms of Service

); }; export default MainDashboard;
